hero.title: VGBC - Connecting Vietnam and the World – Empowering Businesses, Bridging Cultures.
hero.subtitle: VGBC – Vietnam Global Business Council is an organization dedicated to fostering the growth of the business community with the mission of promoting trade cooperation, communication, and partnerships between Vietnamese and international enterprises. At VGBC, our greatest strength lies in our people — a team of seasoned experts, interpreters, bilingual MCs, media consultants, and business strategists who share one common mission: connecting Vietnam with the world. From international event coordinators and bilingual negotiators to trade promotion and global communications specialists, every member of VGBC embodies professionalism, adaptability, and a global mindset. We don’t just provide services — we build human bridges, where businesses and partners can find trust, effectiveness, and real value in every cross-border collaboration. The professionals at VGBC are not only experts; they are cultural connectors, brand storytellers, and representatives of a new generation of global-minded Vietnamese entrepreneurs.

aboutvgbc.title: About VGBC
aboutvgbc.subtitle: The Vietnam Global Business Council (VGBC) empowers Vietnamese and international enterprises to connect, collaborate and grow sustainably. We operate as a strategic trade & business council, facilitating cross‑border partnerships,trade missions and market entry between Vietnam and the world.
aboutvgbc.subtitle1: Be the trusted gateway that enhances Vietnam’s global business presence—linking government, corporations and entrepreneurs through meaningful cooperation and high‑impact initiatives.
aboutvgbc.subtitle2: Position VGBC as Asia’s leading hub for international business promotion and partnership development—where language, integrity and innovation converge.
aboutvgbc.subtitle3.2: Bridging East & West — Multilingual experts turn communication into connection.
aboutvgbc.subtitle3,3: Empowerment & Growth — Measurable impact for sustainable expansion.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.testimonial1: Smooth cabin interpretation, easy to listen to; flexible team and well-prepared for specialized topics.
testimonials.testimonial2: Good terminology processing speed, smooth program support from preparation to operation.
testimonials.testimonial3: Elegant bilingual MC, naturally connecting multicultural audiences and international speakers.
testimonials.testimonial4: Accurate translation team, consistent terminology, fast delivery.
testimonials.testimonial5: Professional interpreters with deep understanding of the medical field, excellent support for our international workshop.
testimonials.testimonial6: High-quality simultaneous interpretation service, helped the conference succeed beyond expectations.
testimonials.testimonial7: Enthusiastic and professional interpreters, very flexible in handling unexpected situations.
testimonials.testimonial8: Interpreters with deep technical knowledge, helped make the product presentation effective.

services.title: What We Offer
services.subtitle: Comprehensive business services for your enterprise.
services.conferenceDesc: Professional interpretation services for conferences and international events with experienced interpreters.
services.bilingualMCDesc: Professional event hosting in two languages, effectively connecting multicultural audiences.
services.englishDesc: Specialized English teaching for businesses and entrepreneurs, focusing on international business communication.
services.eventsDesc: Professional organization of conferences, seminars, and events of various scales from small to large.
services.mediaDesc: Providing media and press advertising services to enhance brand image and visibility.
services.businessDesc: Trade promotion, business connections, creating opportunities for domestic and international business cooperation.
services.investmentDesc: Supporting investment fundraising for projects, connecting with domestic and international investors.
services.aDesc: For international entrepreneurs and investors who wish to visit Vietnam to explore the market, seek business partners, and connect with potential clients.

phiendichvien.title: Our Interpreters
phiendichvien.subtitle: Professional and experienced interpreters ready to serve your events.

servicesPage.title: Professional Interpretation Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Our team of international-class interpreters serves all your important business events with professionalism and the highest accuracy.

cabinSimultaneous.title: Cabin & Simultaneous Interpretation
cabinSimultaneous.subtitle: Premium simultaneous interpretation service for international conferences and events with modern equipment and top-tier expert team.

cabin.title: Cabin Interpretation
cabin.description: Professional soundproof cabin equipment, wireless headphone system, ensuring absolute sound quality for international conferences.

simultaneous.title: Simultaneous Interpretation
simultaneous.description: Interpreters work simultaneously in a soundproof room, transmitting directly to attendees' headphones, suitable for multilingual events.

stage.title: Stage Interpretation
stage.subtitle: Professional interpreters for stage events, workshops, and ceremonies with confident demeanor and excellent presentation skills.

workshop.title: Large Workshops
workshop.description: Interpretation for specialized technical workshops with accurate terminology and professional demeanor.

special.title: Special Events
special.description: Interpretation for ceremonies, galas, and important events requiring formality and absolute accuracy.

cultural.title: Cultural Events
cultural.description: Interpretation for cultural and artistic events requiring deep understanding of both cultures.

bilingualMc.title: Bilingual MC
bilingualMc.subtitle: Professional bilingual MC service, leading international events in multiple languages with confident demeanor and professionalism.

corporate.title: Corporate Event MC
corporate.description: Bilingual MC for corporate events, conferences, and product launches with smooth language switching capabilities.

workshop.title: Specialized Workshop MC
workshop.description: Bilingual MC for technical, medical, financial workshops with deep specialized knowledge and accurate terminology delivery.

meetingExhibition.title: Meeting, Delegation & Exhibition Interpretation
meetingExhibition.subtitle: Professional interpretation service for important meetings, leadership delegations, and trade exhibition events.

meeting.title: Meeting Interpretation
meeting.description: Interpretation for business meetings, contract negotiations, board meetings with accuracy and information confidentiality.

delegation.title: Delegation Interpretation
delegation.description: Professional interpretation service for leadership delegations and business groups with discretion and formality.

exhibition.title: Exhibition Interpretation
exhibition.description: Interpretation at international trade fairs and exhibitions, supporting trade transactions and multinational partnerships.

online.title: Online Interpretation
online.subtitle: High-quality online interpretation service for Zoom, Teams, Webex meetings and other online conference platforms.

service.title: Online Interpretation
service.description: Flexible online interpretation solution without geographical limitations with optimized audio and video quality.

benefits.title: Benefits of Online Interpretation
benefits.description: Cost savings, flexible time and space, global connection without limitations.

languagePersonnel.title: Language Personnel
languagePersonnel.subtitle: Providing high-quality, long-term language personnel for businesses and organizations requiring professionalism and stability.

secretary.title: Bilingual Secretary
secretary.description: Language personnel supporting secretarial and administrative tasks for representative offices and multinational companies.

assistant.title: Multilingual Assistant
assistant.description: Personal assistants, executive directors' assistants fluent in multiple languages supporting daily work.

translator.title: Translation Specialist
translator.description: Translation specialists for documents, contracts, and financial reports with high accuracy.

representative.title: Language Representative
representative.description: Personnel representing at meetings and events on behalf of businesses with excellent language skills.

contact.title: Contact & Request Quote
contact.subtitle: We respond within 24 business hours. Leave your information and receive a detailed quote for the service you need.

about.title: About Us

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: VGBC was established with the mission to become a solid bridge between Vietnamese businesses and the global market. We are committed to providing comprehensive solutions, from professional interpretation, business connections to international event organization, helping Vietnamese businesses confidently reach out to the world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become Vietnam's leading platform for international business connections, building a global partner network and supporting Vietnamese businesses to achieve sustainable success in the world market.
